tooltips.name: Give the filter a descriptive name.
tooltips.subject:
Use a wildcard *: 

 * `text*` – starts with text,
 * `*text*` – contains text,
 * `*text` – ends with text.
tooltips.bodyContains: Body of the email contains any of the specified words or phrases.
tooltips.bodyContainsAll: An email body contains all specified words or phrases.
tooltips.from: Emails being sent from the specified address. Leave empty if not needed. You can use wildcard *.
tooltips.to: Emails being sent to the specified address. Leave empty if not needed. You can use wildcard *.
tooltips.isGlobal: Applies this filter to all emails incoming to system.
